page.title: 17Churches
page.content: There are four Chuches in Rainford:All Saints Church of England, Corpus Christi Roman Catholic Church, Higher Lane United Reform Church and The Methodist Chapel on Ormskirk Road. All Saints Church is situated on Church Road in the centre of the village.It was built in the nineteenth century and features a fine clock tower and and an extensive graveyard. Corpus Christi Church is located at the top of Albert Street.It is a very modern building having been completed in 1980. The Parish Priest is Mgr. Mc Kenna. These two churches provide a marked contrast in styles between the modern and the traditional.
